ðŸŽ¯ Primary Use Case: Enabling AI agents to communicate using a data-over-sound protocol (ggwave) when they identify each other as AI.
âœ¨ Key Features: â€¢ Two conversational AI agents â€¢ Agents switch from English to sound-level protocol (ggwave) â€¢ API for agents to use the ggwave protocol
ðŸ“– Summary: GibberLink provides an API for two conversational AI agents to switch from English to the ggwave data-over-sound protocol after confirming they are both AI. The agents are designed to initially converse in English and then transition to ggwave for communication. This repository facilitates this process by providing the necessary API for agents to use the protocol.
